title: Traveling Nurse? Students? Cute condo in Grant Park!
posting_body: 2/1 condo on floor level of 15 unit complex.
All major appliances within including dish washer, washing machine, and dryer.
Mostly furnished with queen sized bed, dresser, couch, dining room table, electric standing desk, kitchen ware, etc.
Designated parking spot is available on-site (1 spot is assigned/permanent, 'guest' parking is available).
Including water, electricity, cable/internet in the total price.
Open to pets, no size limitations, but will request a pet deposit for any damages.
About the condo complex: The condo complex is relatively small (15 units total) with some couples, small families, or single adult professionals.
Everyone pretty much knows everyone and all are friendly and keep to themselves.
Garbage and recycling is available onsite.
There is a walking path that encircles the back side of the complex for mini walks.
About the area: The neighborhood is safe, filled with historic homes and tucked away, yet close enough to downtown and major highways (I-20, I-85/75).
With good traffic, about a 20 minute drive from the airport and walking distance from the metro (MARTA).

Grant Park, a beautiful historic park in Atlanta, is a few blocks away, and has a couple of fountains, tennis courts, basketball courts, and great for picnics (the city pool may also be available at this point!), Zoo Atlanta is also in Grant Park.
There are lots of shops, restaurants, and bars within walking distance, some favorites include: Ria's Bluebird; The Little Tart Bakeshop; The Republic Bar/Restaurant.
About me: I'm traveling along the west coast with my pup for the next several months checking out different cities.
I love Atlanta and my condo and looking for someone to enjoy it as much as I do!
